test.query_clob:
select a3.pass_yn,
       a3.application_id,
			 null page_id,
			 null child_code,
       a3.application_item_id,
       a3.application_name, 
       a3.item_name, 
       a3.scope,
       a3.created_by,
       a3.created_on, 
       a3.last_updated_by, 
       a3.last_updated_on,
       case when a3.pass_yn = 'N'
            then apex_string.format(p_message => q'^%1, %2 application item (id: %0), should begin with 'G_' and 'A_'^',
                                    p0 => a3.application_item_id,
                                    p1 => a3.item_name, 
                                    p2 => a3.scope)
            end as validation_failure_message,
       case when a3.pass_yn = 'N'
            then apex_string.format(p_message => q'^%0 in app %1 is incorrectly named^',
                                    p0 => a3.item_name,
                                    p1 => a3.application_id
                                    )
            end as issue_title,
			a3.component_id,
	    a3.parent_component_id,
			a3.workspace
from (
     select 
     case when ai.item_name like 'G_%' or ai.item_name like 'A_%'
          then 'Y'
          else 'N'
          end as pass_yn,
     ai.application_id,
     ai.application_item_id,
     ai.application_name, 
     ai.item_name, 
     ai.scope,
     aa.created_by,
     aa.created_on,
     ai.last_updated_by, 
     ai.last_updated_on,
	   ai.application_item_id component_id,
	   null parent_component_id,
	   ai.workspace
     from apex_application_items ai
     inner join v_apex_applications aa on ai.application_id = aa.application_id
                                    and aa.availability_status != 'Unavailable'
) a3
test.explanation:
*   Global Scope Application Items with should be prefixed with "G\_"
*   App Scope Application Items should be prefixed with "A\_".

test.test_name: Page names should be human friendly
test.query_clob:
select case when aap.page_name like '%\_%' escape '\'
            then 'N'
            else 'Y'
            end pass_yn,
       aap.workspace,
       aap.application_id, 
       aap.page_id,
       aap.created_by,
       aap.created_on,
       aap.last_updated_by,
       aap.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Page `%0` (app %1, page %2) is unfriendly', 
        p0 => aap.page_name, 
        p1 => aap.application_id,
        p2 => aap.page_id) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Page `%0` (app %1, page %2) is unfriendly', 
        p0 => aap.page_name, 
        p1 => aap.application_id,
        p2 => aap.page_id) issue_title,
       aap.page_id component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
       aap.page_name,
       aap.page_mode
from apex_application_pages aap
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on  aabo2.build_option_name = aap.build_option
                                                     and aabo2.application_id = aap.application_id
where aap.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and aap.application_id = 17000033
test.explanation: Page names should not have underscores

test.query_clob:
select case when lower(aapb.label) in ('cancel','refresh','reset','create')
            then 'Y'
            when aapb.button_template_options like '%t-Button--simple%'
            then 'Y'
            else 'N'
            end pass_yn,                          
       aapb.application_id, 
       aapb.page_id,
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       aapb.last_updated_by,
       aapb.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Button `%0` (app %1, page %2) should be simple but has the following template :`%3`', 
        p0 => aapb.button_name, 
        p1 => aapb.application_id,
        p2 => aapb.page_id,
        p3 => aapb.button_template_options) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Button `%0` (app %1, page %2) should be simple', 
        p0 => aapb.button_name, 
        p1 => aapb.application_id,
        p2 => aapb.page_id) issue_title,
       aapb.button_id component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
       aapb.button_name,
       aapb.button_template_options,
       aapb.button_is_hot,
			 aapb.label,
			 aapb.workspace
from apex_application_page_buttons aapb
inner join apex_application_pages aap on aap.page_id = aapb.page_id and aap.application_id = aapb.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo1 on aabo1.build_option_name = aap.build_option
                                                     and aabo1.application_id = aap.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on aabo2.build_option_name = aapb.build_option
                                                     and aabo2.application_id = aapb.application_id
where aapb.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
and coalesce(aabo1.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and aapb.application_id = 17000033
and aapb.button_is_hot = 'No'

test.test_name: Delete buttons should be correctly styled
test.query_clob:
select case when  aapb.button_template_options not like '%t-Button--simple%'
            then 'N'
						when  aapb.button_template_options not like '%t-Button--danger%'
            then 'N'
            when aapb.button_is_hot = 'Yes'
            then 'N'
            when aapb.display_position_code != 'DELETE'
            then 'N'
            when aapb.database_action != 'SQL DELETE action'
            then 'N'
            else 'Y'
            end pass_yn,
       aapb.button_name, 
       aapb.button_template, 
       aapb.button_template_options, 
       aapb.button_is_hot, 
       aapb.display_position_code, 
       aapb.confirm_enabled, 
       aapb.database_action,
       aapb.application_id, 
       aapb.page_id,
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       aapb.last_updated_by,
       aapb.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Button `%0` (page %1, app %2) is misconfigured (Template options: `%3`, Button is hot: `%4`, Display position code : `%5`, Database action : `%6`)',
            p0 => aapb.button_name, 
            p1 => aapb.page_id,
            p2 => aapb.application_id, 
            p3 => aapb.button_template_options, 
            p4 => aapb.button_is_hot, 
            p5 => aapb.display_position_code, 
            p6 => aapb.database_action
       ) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Button `%0` (page %1, app %2) is misconfigured',
            p0 => aapb.button_name, 
            p1 => aapb.page_id,
            p2 => aapb.application_id
       )  issue_title,
       aapb.button_id component_id, 
       null parent_component_id,
			 aapb.workspace
from apex_application_page_buttons aapb
inner join apex_application_pages aap on aap.page_id = aapb.page_id and aap.application_id = aapb.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo1 on aabo1.build_option_name = aap.build_option
                                                     and aabo1.application_id = aap.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on aabo2.build_option_name = aapb.build_option
                                                     and aabo2.application_id = aapb.application_id
where aapb.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
and coalesce(aabo1.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and aapb.application_id = 17000033
and aapb.button_name = 'DELETE'

test.test_name: Reset buttons should be styled in a consistent way
test.query_clob:
select case when aapb.button_template != 'Text with Icon'
            then 'N' 
            when aapb.button_template_options not like '%t-Button--warning%'
            then 'N' 
						when aapb.button_template_options not like '%t-Button--noUI%'
            then 'N'
						when aapb.button_template_options not like '%t-Button--iconRight%'
            then 'N'
            when aapb.button_is_hot != 'No'
            then 'N'
            when aapb.icon_css_classes != 'fa-undo-arrow'
            then 'N'
            when aapb.button_action_code != 'REDIRECT_PAGE'
            then 'N'
            when aapb.redirect_url not like '%RR,:%'
            then 'N'
            else 'Y'
            end pass_yn, 
       aapb.application_id, 
       aapb.page_id,
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       aapb.last_updated_by,
       aapb.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Misconfigured reset button [button_template: `%0`, button_template_options: `%1`, button_is_hot: `%2`, icon_css_classes: `%3`, button_action_code: `%4`, redirect_url: `%5`]',
              p0=> aapb.button_template,
              p1=> aapb.button_template_options,
              p2=> aapb.button_is_hot,
              p3=> aapb.icon_css_classes,
              p4=> aapb.button_action_code,
              p5=> aapb.redirect_url
            ) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Misconfigured reset button') issue_title,
       aapb.button_id component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
       aapb.button_template,
       aapb.button_template_options,
       aapb.button_is_hot,
       aapb.icon_css_classes,
       aapb.button_action_code,
       aapb.redirect_url,
			 aapb.workspace
from apex_application_page_buttons aapb
inner join apex_application_pages aap on aap.page_id = aapb.page_id and aap.application_id = aapb.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo1 on aabo1.build_option_name = aap.build_option
                                                     and aabo1.application_id = aap.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on aabo2.build_option_name = aapb.build_option
                                                     and aabo2.application_id = aapb.application_id
where aapb.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
and coalesce(aabo1.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and aapb.application_id = 17000033
and lower(aapb.label) = 'reset'
test.explanation:
Reset button should be styled in a particular way.

*   The Button template should be  'Text with Icon'
*   The type should be 'Warning'
*   The style should be 'Remove UI Decoration'
*   The Icon Positiong should be 'Right'
*   It should not be hot
*   The icon should be 'fa-undo-arrow'
*   The action should be 'Redirect to page in this application'
*   The link action should be 'Reset regions'

test.test_name: Create buttons should be styled in a consistent way
test.query_clob:
select case when aapb.button_action_code = 'REDIRECT_PAGE'
            then case when aapb.button_template != 'Icon'
                      then 'N' 
                      when aapb.button_template_options != '#DEFAULT#:t-Button--noUI'
                      then 'N' 
                      when aapb.button_is_hot = 'No'
                      then 'N' 
                      when aapb.icon_css_classes != 'fa-plus'
                      then 'N' 
                      else 'Y'
                      end
            else 'Y'
            end pass_yn, 
       aapb.application_id, 
       aapb.page_id,
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       aapb.last_updated_by,
       aapb.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Misconfigured `create` button [button_template: `%0`, button_template_options: `%1`, button_is_hot: `%2`, icon_css_classes: `%3`, button_action_code: `%4`]',
              p0=> aapb.button_template,
              p1=> aapb.button_template_options,
              p2=> aapb.button_is_hot,
              p3=> aapb.icon_css_classes,
              p4=> aapb.button_action_code
            ) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Misconfigured `create` button (app %0, page %1, button id %2)',
												 p0 => aapb.application_id, 
       						       p1 => aapb.page_id,
												 p2 => aapb.button_id) issue_title,
       aapb.button_id component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
       aapb.button_template,
       aapb.button_template_options,
       aapb.button_is_hot,
       aapb.icon_css_classes,
       aapb.button_action_code,
       aapb.redirect_url,
       aapb.label,
			 aapb.workspace
from apex_application_page_buttons aapb
inner join apex_application_pages aap on aap.page_id = aapb.page_id and aap.application_id = aapb.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo1 on aabo1.build_option_name = aap.build_option
                                                     and aabo1.application_id = aap.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on aabo2.build_option_name = aapb.build_option
                                                     and aabo2.application_id = aapb.application_id
where aapb.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
and coalesce(aabo1.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and lower(aapb.label) like 'create%'
and aapb.application_id = 17000033
test.explanation:
Create buttons should be styled in a particular way:

*   The button template is 'Icon'
*   the style should be 'Remove UI Decoration'
*   it should be hot
*   should have the icon  'fa-plus'

test.test_name: Apps should have particular set of builds
test.query_clob:
with std as (
    select aa.application_id,
       0 page_id,
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       coalesce (td.last_updated_by, do.last_updated_by) last_updated_by,
       coalesce (td.last_updated_on, do.last_updated_on) last_updated_on,
       case when td.build_option_name is null 
            then 'TO_DELETE_MISSING'
            when do.build_option_name is null
            then 'DEV_ONLY_MISSING'
            else coalesce(td.child_code,do.child_code)
            end child_code, 
       do.build_option_status do_build_option_status, 
       do.status_on_export    do_status_on_export,
       td.build_option_status td_build_option_status, 
       td.status_on_export    td_status_on_export,
	     aa.workspace
    from apex_applications aa
    left join (select 
                  case when build_option_status != 'Include'
                       then 'DEV_ONLY_EXCLUDED'
                       when status_on_export != 'Exclude'
                       then 'DEV_ONLY_INCLUDED'
                       end child_code,
                  application_id, 
                  build_option_name, 
                  build_option_status, 
                  status_on_export,
                  last_updated_by,
                  last_updated_on
            from apex_application_build_options
            where build_option_name = 'DEV_ONLY') do on aa.application_id = do.application_id
    left join (select 
                  case when build_option_status = 'Include' or status_on_export = 'Include'
                       then 'TO_DELETE_INCLUDED'
                       end child_code,
                  application_id, 
                  build_option_name, 
                  build_option_status, 
                  status_on_export,
                  last_updated_by,
                  last_updated_on
            from apex_application_build_options
            where build_option_name = 'TO_DELETE') td on aa.application_id = td.application_id
    where aa.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
)
select case when std.child_code is not null
            then 'N'
            else 'Y'
            end pass_yn,
       std.application_id,
       std.page_id,
       std.created_by,
       std.created_on,
       std.last_updated_by,
       std.last_updated_on,
       case when std.child_code is not null
            then apex_string.format('Application %0 %1',
                                    p0 => std.application_id,
                                    p1 => case when std.child_code = 'TO_DELETE_MISSING'
                                               then 'is missing a `TO_DELETE` build option'
                                               when std.child_code = 'DEV_ONLY_MISSING'
                                               then 'is missing a `DEV_ONLY` build option'
                                               when std.child_code = 'DEV_ONLY_EXCLUDED'
                                               then 'has a misconfigured DEV_ONLY build - it has a build option status set to `Excluded`'
                                               when std.child_code = 'DEV_ONLY_INCLUDED'
                                               then 'has a misconfigured DEV_ONLY build - it has a status on export set to `included`'
                                               when std.child_code = 'TO_DELETE_INCLUDED'
                                               then 'has a misconfigured TO_DELETE build - at least one of the statuses is set to `included`'
                                               end
                                    )
            end  validation_failure_message,
       case when std.child_code is not null
            then apex_string.format('Application %0 %1 (TO_DELETE status = %2, export = %3) (DEV_ONLY status = %4, export = %5)',
                                    p0 => std.application_id,
                                    p1 => case when std.child_code = 'TO_DELETE_MISSING'
                                               then 'is missing a `TO_DELETE` build option'
                                               when std.child_code = 'DEV_ONLY_MISSING'
                                               then 'is missing a `DEV_ONLY` build option'
                                               when std.child_code = 'DEV_ONLY_EXCLUDED'
                                               then 'has a misconfigured DEV_ONLY build - it has a build option status set to `Excluded`'
                                               when std.child_code = 'DEV_ONLY_INCLUDED'
                                               then 'has a misconfigured DEV_ONLY build - it has a status on export set to `included`'
                                               when std.child_code = 'TO_DELETE_INCLUDED'
                                               then 'has a misconfigured TO_DELETE build - at least one of the statuses is set to `included`'
                                               end,
                                    p2 => coalesce(std.td_build_option_status, 'NA'),
                                    p3 => coalesce(std.td_status_on_export, 'NA'),
                                    p4 => coalesce(std.do_build_option_status, 'NA'),
                                    p5 => coalesce(std.do_status_on_export, 'NA')
                                    )
            end issue_title,
	     std.child_code,
       std.do_build_option_status,
       std.do_status_on_export,
       std.td_build_option_status,
       std.td_status_on_export,
			 std.application_id component_id,
	     null parent_component_id,
			 std.workspace
from std
test.explanation:
Apps should have 'dev\_only' and 'to\_delete' builds :

*   DEV\_ONLY\_EXCLUDED : The \`DEV\_ONLY\` build option, as the name suggests should be \`included\` in the dev environment
*   DEV\_ONLY\_INCLUDED : The \`DEV\_ONLY\` build has been misconfigured to include the underlying on objects on export. It should be set to exclude on export.
*   DEV\_ONLY\_MISSING : Apps should have a \`DEV\_ONLY\` build which, as the name suggests, includes the underlying objects in the dev environment, but excludes it on export. This build option is used to flag components that are not ready for deployment
*   TO\_DELETE\_INCLUDED : The \`TO\_DELETE\` build has been misconfigured to include the underlying on objects. It should be set to exclude.
*   TO\_DELETE\_MISSING : Apps should have a \`TO\_DELETE\` build that excludes the underlying objects both in the dev environment and on export. This allows us to flag components that candidates for deletion without having to immediately delete them.

test.test_name: All Cancel buttons should be default
test.query_clob:
select case when aapb.button_template_options = '#DEFAULT#'
            then 'Y'
            else 'N'
            end pass_yn,                          
       aapb.application_id, 
       aapb.page_id,
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       aapb.last_updated_by,
       aapb.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Button `%0` (app %1, page %2) should be default but has the following styling : `%3`', 
        p0 => aapb.button_name, 
        p1 => aapb.application_id,
        p2 => aapb.page_id,
        p3 => aapb.button_template_options) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Button `%0` (app %1, page %2) should be default', 
        p0 => aapb.button_name, 
        p1 => aapb.application_id,
        p2 => aapb.page_id) issue_title,
       aapb.button_id component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
       aapb.button_name,
       aapb.button_template_options,
       aapb.button_is_hot,
       aapb.label,
			 aapb.workspace
from apex_application_page_buttons aapb
inner join apex_application_pages aap on aap.page_id = aapb.page_id and aap.application_id = aapb.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo1 on aabo1.build_option_name = aap.build_option
                                                     and aabo1.application_id = aap.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on aabo2.build_option_name = aapb.build_option
                                                     and aabo2.application_id = aapb.application_id
where aapb.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
and coalesce(aabo1.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and lower(aapb.label) = 'cancel'
and aapb.application_id = 17000033

test.test_name: RDS regions should have a template of Tabs Container
test.query_clob:
select case when aapr.template = 'Tabs Container'
            then 'Y'
            else 'N'
            end pass_yn,
       aapr.workspace,
       aapr.application_id, 
       aapr.page_id,
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       aapr.last_updated_by,
       aapr.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Region `%0` (app %1, page %2) should have `Tabs Container` template but has a `%3` template instead', 
        p0 => aapr.region_name, 
        p1 => aapr.application_id,
        p2 => aapr.page_id,
        p3 => aapr.template) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Region `%0` (app %1, page %2) has the wrong template', 
        p0 => aapr.region_name, 
        p1 => aapr.application_id,
        p2 => aapr.page_id) issue_title,
       aapr.region_id component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
       aapr.region_name,
       aapr.template,
       aapr.display_position,
       aapr.source_type,
       aapr.component_template_options,
       aapr.report_template
from apex_application_page_regions aapr
inner join apex_application_pages aap on aap.page_id = aapr.page_id
                                      and aap.application_id = aapr.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo1 on  aabo1.build_option_name = aap.build_option
                                                     and aabo1.application_id = aap.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on  aabo2.build_option_name = aapr.build_option
                                                     and aabo2.application_id = aapr.application_id
where aapr.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
and coalesce(aabo1.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and aapr.application_id = 17000033
and aapr.source_type = 'Region Display Selector'
test.explanation: Region Display Selectors should have a template of Tabs Container

test.query_clob:
select case when aapr.template != 'Title Bar'
            then 'N'
            when aapr.display_position != 'Breadcrumb Bar'
            then 'N'
            else 'Y'
            end pass_yn,                          
       aapr.application_id, 
       aapr.page_id,
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       aapr.last_updated_by,
       aapr.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Region `%0` (app %1, page %2) is misconfigured. The Template is `%3` and the display position is `%4`', 
        p0 => aapr.region_name, 
        p1 => aapr.application_id,
        p2 => aapr.page_id,
        p3 => aapr.template,
        p4 => aapr.display_position) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Region `%0` (app %1, page %2) is misconfigured', 
        p0 => aapr.region_name, 
        p1 => aapr.application_id,
        p2 => aapr.page_id) issue_title,
       aapr.region_id component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
       aapr.region_name,
       aapr.template,
       aapr.display_position,
       aapr.source_type,
			 aapr.workspace
from apex_application_page_regions aapr
inner join apex_application_pages aap on aap.page_id = aapr.page_id and aap.application_id = aapr.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo1 on aabo1.build_option_name = aap.build_option
                                                     and aabo1.application_id = aap.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on aabo2.build_option_name = aapr.build_option
                                                     and aabo2.application_id = aapr.application_id
where aapr.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
and coalesce(aabo1.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and aapr.source_type = 'Breadcrumb'
and aapr.application_id = 17000033
test.explanation: Breadcrumbs should be styled for consistency

test.test_name: All AST Standard Buttons have left-sided icons
test.query_clob:
select case when lower(aapb.label) in ('cancel', 'delete', 'reset','apply changes','create', 'save')
            then 'Y'
            when aapb.button_template = 'Icon'
            then 'Y'
            when aapb.button_template != 'Text with Icon'
            then 'N'
            when aapb.button_template_options not like '%t-Button--iconLeft%'
            then 'N'
            when aapb.icon_css_classes is null
            then 'N'
            else 'Y'
            end pass_yn,                          
       aapb.application_id, 
       aapb.page_id,
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       aapb.last_updated_by,
       aapb.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Button `%0` (app %1, page %2) has a misconfigured icon. It has an icon of `%3`, options of `%4` and a template of `%5`', 
        p0 => aapb.button_name, 
        p1 => aapb.application_id,
        p2 => aapb.page_id,
        p3 => aapb.icon_css_classes,
        p4 => aapb.button_template_options,
        p5 => aapb.button_template) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Button `%0` (app %1, page %2) has a misconfigured icon', 
        p0 => aapb.button_name, 
        p1 => aapb.application_id,
        p2 => aapb.page_id) issue_title,
       aapb.button_id component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
       aapb.button_name,
       aapb.button_template_options,
       aapb.button_is_hot,
       aapb.label,
       aapb.icon_css_classes,
       aapb.button_template,
			 aapb.workspace
from apex_application_page_buttons aapb
inner join apex_application_pages aap on aap.page_id = aapb.page_id and aap.application_id = aapb.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo1 on aabo1.build_option_name = aap.build_option
                                                     and aabo1.application_id = aap.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on aabo2.build_option_name = aapb.build_option
                                                     and aabo2.application_id = aapb.application_id
where aapb.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
and coalesce(aabo1.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and aapb.application_id = 17000033
test.explanation: Unless it is a standard button ('cancel', 'delete', 'reset','apply changes','create'), all buttons must have icons

test.test_name: SVT Application Pages should have Authorization Schemes
test.query_clob:
with origin_auth as (select 
                         spu.destination_app_id, spu.destination_page_id
                         , listagg(distinct spu.element_authorization       ,'/' on overflow truncate with count) within group (order by spu.element_authorization) origin_element_authorization
                         , listagg(distinct spu.parent_element_authorization,'/' on overflow truncate with count) within group (order by spu.parent_element_authorization) origin_parent_element_authorization
                         , listagg(distinct spu.page_authorization          ,'/' on overflow truncate with count) within group (order by spu.page_authorization) origin_page_authorization
                         from v_mv_svt spu
                         where spu.destination_app_id is not null
                         and spu.destination_page_id is not null
                         and spu.url_type not in ('BC_URL') --breadcrumbs cause a lot of complexity in this context
                         group by spu.destination_app_id, spu.destination_page_id
                    ),
     a40 as (
          select 
          case when aap.page_requires_authentication = 'Yes'
               and aap.authorization_scheme is null
               then 'N'
			 				 when aap.authorization_scheme = 'APPLICATION SENTRY'
			 				 then 'N'
               else 'Y'
               end as pass_yn, 
          aap.application_id,
          aap.page_id, 
          aap.page_name, 
          aap.page_access_protection, 
          aap.page_mode,
          aap.page_requires_authentication,
          apex_string.format('%0:%1:%2:%3', oa.origin_element_authorization,oa.origin_parent_element_authorization, oa.origin_page_authorization, aa.authorization_scheme) origin_authorizations,
          aap.build_option,
          bo.build_option_status,
			    bo.status_on_export,
          oa.origin_element_authorization,
          oa.origin_parent_element_authorization origin_parent_elemnt_authztn, 
          oa.origin_page_authorization, 
          aa.authorization_scheme app_authorization_scheme,
          aap.created_by, 
          aap.created_on, 
          aap.last_updated_by, 
          aap.last_updated_on,
			    aap.workspace
          from apex_application_pages aap
          inner join apex_applications aa on aap.application_id = aa.application_id
                                          and aa.availability_status != 'Unavailable'
          left join apex_application_build_options bo on aap.application_id = bo.application_id
                                                  and aap.build_option = bo.build_option_name
          left join origin_auth oa on oa.destination_app_id = aap.application_id
                                   and oa.destination_page_id = aap.page_id
          where aap.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
			    and aap.page_id != 0
          and (bo.status_on_export != 'Exclude' or bo.build_option_status is null)
     )
select a40.pass_yn, 
       a40.application_id,
       a40.page_id, 
       a40.page_name, 
       a40.page_access_protection, 
       a40.page_mode,
       a40.page_requires_authentication,
       a40.origin_authorizations,
       a40.build_option,
       a40.build_option_status,
       a40.origin_element_authorization,
       a40.origin_parent_elemnt_authztn, 
       a40.origin_page_authorization, 
       a40.app_authorization_scheme,
       a40.created_by, 
       a40.created_on, 
       a40.last_updated_by, 
       a40.last_updated_on,
       case when a40.pass_yn = 'N'
            then apex_string.format(p_message => 
            q'^Page %10 is missing an authorization scheme. 
            • Page Access Protection: %0
            • Page Mode: %1
            • Page Requires Authentication: %2
            • Origin Authorizations: %3 
            %4 
            %5^',
            p0 => a40.page_access_protection, 
            p1 => a40.page_mode,
            p2 => a40.page_requires_authentication,
            p3 => a40.origin_authorizations,
            p4 => case when a40.build_option is not null
                       then '• Build Option: '||a40.build_option
                       end,
            p5 => case when a40.build_option_status is not null
                       then '• Build status: '||a40.build_option_status
                       end,
            p6 => a40.origin_element_authorization,
            p7 => a40.origin_parent_elemnt_authztn, 
            p8 => a40.origin_page_authorization, 
            p9 => a40.app_authorization_scheme,
            p10 => a40.page_id
            )
            end as validation_failure_message,
       case when a40.pass_yn = 'N'
            then apex_string.format(p_message => 
            q'^SVT Page %0 (app %1) is missing an authorization scheme^',
            p0 => a40.page_id, 
            p1 => a40.application_id
            )
            end as issue_title,
			 a40.page_id component_id,
			 null parent_component_id,
			 a40.workspace
from a40
where a40.application_id = 17000033
test.explanation: SVT Application pages should have authorization schemes for consistency and security
test.fix:
Select an authorization scheme applied to the page. Authorization schemes are defined at the application-level and can be applied to many elements within the application.

An authorization scheme is evaluated either once for each application session (at session creation), or once for each page view. If the selected authorization scheme evaluates to **TRUE**, then the page displays and is subject to other defined conditions. If it evaluates to **FALSE**, then the page does not display and an error message displays.

test.query_clob:
select case when aap.page_template in ('Drawer','Wizard Modal Dialog')
            then 'Y'
            else 'N'
            end pass_yn, 
       aap.page_template,
       aap.application_id, 
       aap.page_id,
       aap.created_by,
       aap.created_on,
       aap.last_updated_by,
       aap.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format ('Page %0 (app %1) is using the wrong Page Template. Modal Dialogs should use the `Drawer` template',
          p0 => aap.page_id,
          p1 => aap.application_id
       ) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format ('Page %0 (app %1) is using the wrong template',
          p0 => aap.page_id,
          p1 => aap.application_id
       ) issue_title,
       aap.page_id component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
			 aap.workspace
from apex_application_pages aap
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on aabo2.build_option_name = aap.build_option
                                                     and aabo2.application_id = aap.application_id
where aap.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and aap.page_mode = 'Modal Dialog'
and aap.application_id = 17000033

test.test_name: Breadcrumb hierarchy should match nav menu
test.query_clob:
with bce as (select application_id, element_label, element_id, parent_element_name, 
                opt_parent_element_id, destination_app_id, destination_page_id, parent_element_id, last_updated_by, last_updated_on, workspace
                from mv_svt_bc_entries),
    bcep as (select application_id, element_label, element_id, destination_app_id, destination_page_id, parent_element_id, workspace
                from mv_svt_bc_entries),
    nle as (select spu.application_id, spu.element_id, spu.parent_element_id, spu.parent_element_name, spu.destination_page_id, spu.opt_parent_element_id, spu.workspace
            from mv_svt_list_entries spu
            inner join apex_applications aa on spu.application_id = aa.application_id
                                            and spu.parent_element_name = aa.navigation_list),
    nlep as (select spu.application_id, spu.element_id, spu.parent_element_id, spu.parent_element_name, spu.destination_page_id, spu.opt_parent_element_id, spu.workspace
            from mv_svt_list_entries spu
            inner join apex_applications aa on spu.application_id = aa.application_id
                                            and spu.parent_element_name = aa.navigation_list),
    std as (select  bce.application_id, 
                    bce.element_label, 
                    bce.parent_element_name,
                    bce.destination_page_id bc_target_page_id,
                    bcep.destination_page_id bc_parent_target_page_id,
                    nle.destination_page_id le_target_page_id,
                    nlep.destination_page_id le_parent_target_page_id,
                    bce.element_id component_id,
                    bce.parent_element_id parent_component_id,
                    bce.last_updated_by, 
                    bce.last_updated_on,
                    bce.workspace
                    from bce
                    inner join bcep on bce.opt_parent_element_id = bcep.element_id
                                    and bce.parent_element_id = bcep.parent_element_id
                                    and bce.application_id = bcep.application_id
                    left outer join nle on nle.application_id = bce.application_id
                                        and nle.destination_page_id = bce.destination_page_id
                    left outer join nlep on nlep.application_id = bce.application_id
                                        and nlep.element_id = nle.opt_parent_element_id
                    where bce.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
            )
select case when aap.page_template like 'AO%'
            then 'Y'
            when std.bc_parent_target_page_id = std.le_parent_target_page_id
            then 'Y'
            else 'N'
            end pass_yn, 
       std.application_id, 
       null page_id,
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       std.last_updated_by,
       std.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format (
            'The parent breadcrumb entry of `%0` (app %1, page %2) targets page %3. %4',
            p0 =>  std.element_label,
            p1 => std.application_id,
            p2 => std.bc_target_page_id,
            p3 => std.bc_parent_target_page_id,
            p4 => case when std.le_target_page_id is null 
                       then 'There is no corresponding nav menu entry'
                       else case when std.le_parent_target_page_id is null 
                                then 'The corresponding nav list entry has no parent'
                                else 'The parent nav list entry for the same page targets page '||std.le_parent_target_page_id
                                end
                       end
       ) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format (
            'The parent breadcrumb entry of `%0` (app %1, page %2) does not match the nav menu entry',
            p0 =>  std.element_label,
            p1 => std.application_id,
            p2 => std.bc_target_page_id
       ) issue_title,
       std.component_id, 
       std.parent_component_id,
       std.element_label, 
       std.parent_element_name,
       std.bc_target_page_id,
       std.bc_parent_target_page_id,
       std.le_target_page_id,
       std.le_parent_target_page_id,
       aap.page_template,
			 std.workspace
from std
inner join apex_application_pages aap on  aap.application_id = std.application_id
                                      and aap.page_id = std.bc_target_page_id
																			and aap.page_template not like 'AO%'
inner join apex_application_pages aap2 on  aap2.application_id = std.application_id
                                       and aap2.page_id = std.bc_parent_target_page_id
                                       and aap2.page_template not like 'AO%'
test.explanation: Breadcrumb hierarchies should match navigation menu hierarchies

test.test_name: Button names and labels should be correctly capitalized
test.query_clob:
select case when aapb.button_name != upper(aapb.button_name)
            then 'N'
            when aapb.label = upper(aapb.label)
            then 'N'
            else 'Y'
            end pass_yn,
       aapb.workspace,
       aapb.application_id, 
       aapb.page_id,
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       aapb.last_updated_by,
       aapb.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Button `%0`/`%3` (app %1, page %2) is incorrectly capitalized. Names should be all caps, labels should be mixed case.', 
        p0 => aapb.button_name, 
        p1 => aapb.application_id,
        p2 => aapb.page_id,
        p3 => aapb.label) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Button `%0`/`%3` (app %1, page %2) is incorrectly capitalized', 
        p0 => aapb.button_name, 
        p1 => aapb.application_id,
        p2 => aapb.page_id,
        p3 => aapb.label) issue_title,
       aapb.button_id component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
       aapb.button_name,
       aapb.button_template_options,
       aapb.button_is_hot,
       aapb.label,
       aapb.database_action
from apex_application_page_buttons aapb
inner join apex_application_pages aap on aap.page_id = aapb.page_id
                                      and aap.application_id = aapb.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo1 on  aabo1.build_option_name = aap.build_option
                                                     and aabo1.application_id = aap.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on  aabo2.build_option_name = aapb.build_option
                                                     and aabo2.application_id = aapb.application_id
where aapb.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
and coalesce(aabo1.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and aapb.application_id = 17000033
test.explanation: For app consistency. Button names should be all caps, labels should be mixed case.

test.test_name: Navigation menu list entries should have icons
test.query_clob:
select case when entry_image is null
            then 'N' 
            else 'Y'
            end pass_yn, 
       aale.application_id, 
       null page_id,
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       aale.last_updated_by,
       aale.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Menu entry `%0` (app %1) is missing an icon',
                p0 => entry_text,
                p1 => aale.application_id
            ) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Menu entry `%0` is missing an icon',
                p0 => entry_text,
                p1 => aale.application_id
            ) issue_title,
       aale.list_entry_id component_id, 
       aale.list_entry_parent_id parent_component_id,
			 aale.workspace
from apex_application_list_entries aale
inner join apex_applications aa on aale.application_id = aa.application_id
                                and aale.list_name = aa.navigation_list
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on aabo2.build_option_name = aale.build_option
                                                     and aabo2.application_id = aale.application_id
where aale.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and aale.application_id = 17000033
test.fix: Tip : you can find a Universal Theme icon here : [https://apex.oracle.com/pls/apex/apex\_pm/r/ut/icons](https://apex.oracle.com/pls/apex/apex_pm/r/ut/icons)

test.query_clob:
select case when aapb.label != 'Save'
            then 'N'
            else 'Y'
            end pass_yn,
       aapb.workspace,
       aapb.application_id, 
       aapb.page_id,
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       aapb.last_updated_by,
       aapb.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Button `%0`/`%3` (app %1, page %2) must be labeled "Save" based on its action `%4`', 
        p0 => aapb.button_name, 
        p1 => aapb.application_id,
        p2 => aapb.page_id,
        p3 => aapb.label,
        p4 => aapb.database_action) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Button `%0` (app %1, page %2) must be labeled "Save"', 
        p0 => aapb.button_name, 
        p1 => aapb.application_id,
        p2 => aapb.page_id) issue_title,
       aapb.button_id component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
       aapb.button_name,
       aapb.button_template_options,
       aapb.button_is_hot,
       aapb.label,
       aapb.database_action
from apex_application_page_buttons aapb
inner join apex_application_pages aap on aap.page_id = aapb.page_id
                                      and aap.application_id = aapb.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo1 on  aabo1.build_option_name = aap.build_option
                                                     and aabo1.application_id = aap.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on  aabo2.build_option_name = aapb.build_option
                                                     and aabo2.application_id = aapb.application_id
where aapb.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
and coalesce(aabo1.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and aapb.database_action ='SQL UPDATE action'
and aapb.application_id = 17000033
test.fix: Correct the label or the database action

test.test_name: List Menu Entries have Descriptions (for searchability)
test.query_clob:
select case when aale.ENTRY_ATTRIBUTE_04 is null 
            then 'N'
            else 'Y'
            end pass_yn, 
       aale.application_id, 
       null page_id,
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       aale.last_updated_by,
       aale.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('List Menu Entry `%0` (app %1) is missing a subtitle (`4. Title Attribute`)',
              p0 => aale.entry_text,
              p1 => aale.application_id
       ) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Menu Entry `%0` (app %1) is missing a subtitle',
              p0 => aale.entry_text,
              p1 => aale.application_id
       ) issue_title,
       aale.list_entry_id component_id, 
       aale.list_entry_parent_id parent_component_id,
       aale.entry_attribute_01,
			 aale.entry_attribute_04,
       aale.entry_text,
			 aale.workspace
from apex_application_list_entries aale
inner join apex_applications aa on aa.application_id = aale.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on aabo2.build_option_name = aale.build_option
                                                     and aabo2.application_id = aale.application_id
where aale.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and aale.application_id = 17000033
